code:
```mermaid
---
config:
  theme: redux-color
  look: neo
---

sequenceDiagram
        actor User
        participant WebUI
        participant Server
        participant Database
        User->>WebUI: Open product list page
        activate WebUI
        WebUI->>WebUI: Display Search Bar
        WebUI->>+Server: GET /products{}
        
        Server->>+Database: Retrieve product based on keyword
        Database-->>-Server: List of product
        Server-->>WebUI: 200 / {meta, list product}

        %% find a product
        User->>WebUI: User search an product
        WebUI->>Server: GET /find{}
        Server ->> +Database : Query the product
        
        alt found
            Database -->> Server: Return product
            Server -->> WebUI : 200 / {meta,list of product}
        else not found
            Database -->>- Server: Return database error
            Server -->>WebUI:404 / {message}
            WebUI -->> User: Display error message
        end
        
        WebUI->>WebUI: Display the result
        
        %% filter a product
        User->>WebUI: User select filter option
        WebUI->>Server: GET / filter{}
        Server-->>+Database: Retrieve filtered product
        Database-->>-Server: List of filtered product
        
        Server-->>-WebUI: 200 {meta, list product}
        User->>WebUI: User select product
        WebUI->>-WebUI: Redirect to product detail page
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
